ops.description: Bank[6][0] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:10}); // {Aeris}
“There's no time for this!
We have to go after {Cait Sith}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // {Barret}
“The hell're you doin'!?
We're goin' after {Cait Sith}!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Tifa}
“There's no time to waste.
Let's hurry and go after {Cait Sith}!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // {Yuffie}
“Should we be wasting time like this?
Weren't we going after {Cait Sith}?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // “For reservations, please
step up to the counter.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:0}); // “Welcome.
Thank you for coming to
the Ghost Hotel.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // “For reservations, please
step up to the counter.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // “Welcome.
No matter what happens in this world,
The Ghost Hotel will always be in business.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // “For reservations, please
step up to the counter.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // “It's our most popular employee,
Mr. Hangman.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // “Ugh, ugh, ugh
You don't have enough GP.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // Mr. Hangman
“Sir…Please
register at the counter!!”

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:17}); // [Turtle's Paradise]
No. 3{PAUSE}Forget the bad times
with a nice drink…{PAUSE}Only thing missing
in the Gold Saucer is…{PAUSE}A pub with good drinks
and a great atmosphere!{PAUSE}Stop in the
"Turtle's Paradise"!

dialogStrings:
“Welcome.
Thank you for coming to
the Ghost Hotel.”

“Welcome.
No matter what happens in this world,
The Ghost Hotel will always be in business.”

“For reservations, please
step up to the counter.”

“It's our most popular employee,
Mr. Hangman.”

“It's 5 GP a night.
Would you like to stay?”
{CHOICE}Yeah, all right
{CHOICE}No thanks

“Ugh, ugh, ugh, ugh!
Enjoy, ugh, your stay.”

“Ugh, ugh, ugh
You don't have enough GP.”

{Aeris}
“There's no time for this!
We have to go after {Cait Sith}.”

{Tifa}
“There's no time to waste.
Let's hurry and go after {Cait Sith}!”

{Yuffie}
“Should we be wasting time like this?
Weren't we going after {Cait Sith}?”

{Barret}
“The hell're you doin'!?
We're goin' after {Cait Sith}!”

Mr. Hangman
“Sir…Please
register at the counter!!”

[Turtle's Paradise]
No. 3{PAUSE}Forget the bad times
with a nice drink…{PAUSE}Only thing missing
in the Gold Saucer is…{PAUSE}A pub with good drinks
and a great atmosphere!{PAUSE}Stop in the
"Turtle's Paradise"!
